login.title: Gal Cashflow
login.description: Geli faahfaahintaada hoose si aad u gasho akoonkaaga.
login.startTrial: Bilow tijaabo 14 maalmood ah oo bilaash ah
login.emptyFields: Magaca isticmaalaha iyo erayga sirta ah ma noqon karaan kuwo madhan.

signup.title: Sameyso Akoon
signup.description: Ku soo biir Cashflow maanta si aad si fudud ugu maamusho dhaqaalahaaga.
signup.genericError: Cilad ayaa dhacday. Fadlan isku day mar kale.

modals.deleteBusinessMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad tirtirto "{businessName}"? Dhammaan buugaagta iyo macaamilada la xidhiidha si joogto ah ayaa meesha looga saari doonaa.
modals.removeMemberMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad ka saarto "{memberName}" ganacsigan?
modals.setBookNameDesc: Sii buuggaaga cusub magac gaar ah.
modals.deleteBookMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad tirtirto buugga "{bookName}"? Dhammaan macaamiladiisa si joogto ah ayaa luntay.
modals.deleteAllTransactionsMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad tirtirto dhammaan gelitaannada buuggan? Tallaabadan waa mid aan laga noqon karin.
modals.deleteTransactionMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad tirtirto macaamiladan: "{transactionDesc}"? Tallaabadan dib looma celin karo.
modals.deleteTransactionsMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad si joogto ah u tirtirto {count} macaamilo ee la doortay? Tallaabadan dib looma celin karo.
modals.confirmTransferMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad lahaanshaha u wareejiso {email}?
modals.confirmTransferWarning: Waxaa laguu hoosayn doonaa doorka 'Maareeye' waxaadna lumin doontaa dhammaan rukhsadaha lahaanshaha, oo ay ku jirto awoodda aad ku tirtirto ganacsigan ama aad mar kale ku wareejiso lahaanshaha. Tallaabadan waa mid aan laga noqon karin.
modals.aiReportTitle: Soo koobid Warbixin AI ku shaqeysa
modals.aiReportGenerating: Warbixintaada waa la diyaarinayaa, fadlan sug...
modals.aiReportReady: Soo koobidaada AI ku shaqeysa waa diyaar.
modals.inviteUserDesc: Dooro ganacsi oo geli iimaylka isticmaalaha si aad u dirto martiqaad.
modals.uploadInstructions: Dooro fayl si aad u soo rarto. Hubi inuu raacayo qaabka loo baahan yahay (CSV ama Excel).
modals.fileReady: {count} macaamilo ayaa la helay oo diyaar u ah in la soo dhoofiyo.
modals.missingHeaders: Tiirarka loo baahan yahay ee soo socda ayaa ka maqan: {headers}
modals.previewSuccess: Faylka si guul leh ayaa loo falanqeeyay. Waxaa la helay {count} macaamilo si loo soo dhoofiyo.
modals.noValidRows: Lama helin safaf xog sax ah oo ku jira faylka.

welcome.title: Ku soo dhowow Cashflow
welcome.message: Ka dooro ganacsi dhinaca si aad u aragto buugaagtiisa iyo macaamiladiisa, ama abuur mid cusub si aad u bilowdo.

dashboard.noBooksCTA: Guji "Ku dar Buug Cusub" si aad u bilowdo.

reports.title: Warbixinnada
reports.pleaseSelectBusinessDesc: Ka dooro ganacsi liiska hoos-u-dhaca si aad u soo saarto warbixinno.
reports.noTransactions: Ma jiraan macaamilo ku habboon shaandhadaada.
reports.noTransactionsDesc: Dooro hal buug ama ka badan si aad u aragto natiijooyinka.

settings.title: Dejinta
settings.currencyDesc: Dooro lacagta lagu soo bandhigayo qaddarrada maaliyadeed.
settings.notificationsDesc: Maamul sida aad u hesho cusbooneysiinta codsiga.
settings.shareAppDesc: Haddii aad Cashflow ka hesho, la wadaag dadka kale!
settings.spreadTheWord: Naga caawi inaan korno adoo faafinaya ereyga.
settings.shareText: Eeg Cashflow si aad u maamusho dhaqaalahaaga!
settings.aboutAppDesc: Nooca codsiga iyo macluumaadka sharciga ah.
settings.lastUpdated: Markii ugu dambaysay ee la cusbooneysiiyay
settings.profileDesc: Sidan ayay dadka kale kugu arki doonaan bogga.
settings.name: Magaca
settings.dangerZoneDesc: Tallaabooyinkani waa kuwo burburin kara oo aan laga noqon karin.
settings.transferOwnershipDesc: U wareeji ganacsigan xubin kale oo kooxda ka tirsan.
settings.deleteBusinessDesc: Si joogto ah u tirtir ganacsigan iyo dhammaan xogtiisa.
settings.noBusinessSelectedDesc: Ka dooro ganacsi dhinaca si aad u maamusho dejintiisa.
settings.sendBackupEmailDesc: Nuqul xogtaada ah ayaa lagu diyaarin doonaa barnaamijkaaga iimaylka ee caadiga ah.
settings.copyDataDesc: Wuxuu nuqul ka sameeyaa dhammaan xogta ganacsigaaga sida shay JSON ah.

transactions.noTransactions: Weli ma jiraan macaamilo buuggan ku jira.
transactions.noFilteredTransactions: Ma jiraan macaamilo ku habboon raadintaada.

bookSettings.title: Dejinta Buugga
bookSettings.entryFieldsDesc: Habka Bixinta, Xidhiidhka, Goobaha gaarka ah
bookSettings.editRoles: Wax ka beddel Doorka Hawlwadeenka Xogta
bookSettings.editRolesDesc: Samee isbeddelo doorka sidaad u baahan tahay
bookSettings.deleteBookDesc: Markaad tirtirto buug, dhammaan macaamiladiisa si joogto ah ayay u lumin doonaan.

users.title: Maareynta Isticmaalayaasha
users.description: Eeg oo maamul dhammaan isticmaalayaasha dhammaan ganacsiyadaada.
users.noUsersDescription: Cusbooneysii xubintaada koowaad ee kooxda adigoo gujinaya badhanka 'Cusbooneysii Isticmaale'.
